== Description ==

Displays the [[Glossary#Permalink|permalink]] to the post to which a comment belongs, formatted for [[Glossary#RSS|RSS]]. Typically used in the RSS comment feed template. This tag must be within [[The Loop]], or a comment loop.

== Usage ==

%%% <?php permalink_comments_rss(); ?> %%%

== Example ==

 <link><?php permalink_comments_rss(); ?></link>

== Parameters ==

This tag has no parameters.
